languages.text: {n}Мужчина переводит взгляд на Абеляра, а затем — опять на вас.{/n} "Сенешаль"? "Лорд-капитан"? Я имею честь разговаривать с {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольным Торговцем{/g}? Позвольте представиться — Хейнрикс ван Калокс, дознаватель Ордо Ксенос Инквизиции {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Императора{/g}. Признаться, я озадачен встречей со столь почтенной персоной в таком месте".

traits.locale_text: {n}Мужчина переводит взгляд на Абеляра, а затем — опять на вас.{/n} "Сенешаль"? "Лорд-капитан"? Я имею честь разговаривать с {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольным Торговцем{/g}? Позвольте представиться — Хейнрикс ван Калокс, дознаватель священного Ордо Ксенос Инквизиции {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Императора{/g}. Признаться, я озадачен встречей со столь почтенной персоной в таком месте".

languages.text: {n}The man looks over at Abelard and then at you again.{/n} "'Seneschal'? 'Lord Captain'? Do I have the pleasure of speaking to a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}? Allow me to introduce myself — Interrogator Heinrix van Calox of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperial{/g} Inquisition's esteemed Ordo Xenos. I must confess I'm perplexed to meet someone of your standing in a place like this."
languages.original_text: {n}Мужчина переводит взгляд на Абеляра, а затем — опять на вас.{/n} "Сенешаль"? "Лорд-капитан"? Я имею честь разговаривать с {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольным Торговцем{/g}? Позвольте представиться — Хейнрикс ван Калокс, дознаватель Ордо Ксенос Инквизиции {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Императора{/g}. Признаться, я озадачен встречей со столь почтенной персоной в таком месте".

traits.locale_text: {n}The man looks over at Abelard and then at you again.{/n} "'Senechal?' 'Lord Captain?' Do I have the pleasure of speaking to a Rogue Trader? Allow me to introduce myself; Interrogator Heinrix van Calox of the Imperial Inquisition's Holy Ordo Xenos. I must confess I'm perplexed to meet someone of such esteem in a place like this."

Allow me to introduce myself; Interrogator Heinrix van Calox of the Imperial Inquisition's Holy Ordo Xenos. I must confess I'm perplexed to meet someone of such esteem in a place like this."

Allow me to introduce myself — Interrogator Heinrix van Calox of the Imperial Inquisition's Holy Ordo Xenos. I must confess I'm perplexed to meet someone of your standing in a place like this."

{n}The man looks over at Abelard and then at you again.{/n} "'Seneschal?' 'Lord Captain?' Do I have the pleasure of speaking to a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}? Allow me to introduce myself — Interrogator Heinrix van Calox of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperial{/g} Inquisition's esteemed Ordo Xenos. I must confess I'm perplexed to meet someone of your standing in a place like this."

languages.text: {n}男人看了看阿贝拉德，随后又看了看你。{/n}“‘总领’？‘舰长大人’？莫非我有幸能与{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}交谈吗？请允许我自我介绍一下，我是{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝国{/g}审讯官海因里希·冯·卡洛克斯，来自神圣的异形审判庭。我得承认我很困惑，没想到会在这种地方遇到像你这样位高权重的人。”
languages.original_text: {n}The man looks over at Abelard and then at you again.{/n} "'Seneschal'? 'Lord Captain'? Do I have the pleasure of speaking to a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}? Allow me to introduce myself — Interrogator Heinrix van Calox of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperial{/g} Inquisition's esteemed Ordo Xenos. I must confess I'm perplexed to meet someone of your standing in a place like this."

traits.locale_text: {n}男人看了看阿贝拉德，随后又看了看你。{/n}“‘总领’？‘舰长大人’？莫非我有幸能与{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}交谈吗？请允许我自我介绍一下，我是{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝国{/g}审讯官海因里希·冯·卡洛克斯，来自神圣的异形审判庭。我得承认我很困惑，没想到会在这种地方遇到像你这样位高权重的人。”
{n}男人看了看阿贝拉德，随后又看了看你。{/n}“‘总领’？‘舰长大人’？莫非我有幸能与{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}交谈吗？请允许我自我介绍一下，我是{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝国{/g}审讯官海因里希·冯·卡洛克斯，来自神圣的异形审判庭。我得承认我很困惑，没想到会在这种地方遇到像你这样位高权重的人。”

languages.text: {n}男はアベラルドに目をやり、再びあなたを見た。{/n}「家令長？ロード・キャプテン？我は{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}と話をすることを喜ぶべきなのでしょうか？さて、自己紹介をさせていただきましょう。我は、{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝国{/g}の異端審問庁、栄誉ある『純血の団』のインテロゲイター、ハインリックス・ヴァン・カロックスです。正直、このような場であなた方のような立場の者と会うことに困惑しております」
languages.original_text: {n}The man looks over at Abelard and then at you again.{/n} "'Seneschal'? 'Lord Captain'? Do I have the pleasure of speaking to a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}? Allow me to introduce myself — Interrogator Heinrix van Calox of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperial{/g} Inquisition's esteemed Ordo Xenos. I must confess I'm perplexed to meet someone of your standing in a place like this."

traits.locale_text: {n}男はアベラードに目をやり、再びあなたを見た。{/n}「家令長？ロード・キャプテン？私は{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}ローグトレーダー{/g}と話をすることを喜ぶべきなのだろうか？さて、自己紹介をさせていただこう。私は、{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝国{/g}の異端審問庁、神聖なる〈純血の団〉のインテロゲイター、ハインリックス・ヴァン・カロックス。正直、このような場であなた方のような立場の者と会うことに困惑している。

languages.text: {n}Der Mann mustert Abelard und dann ein weiteres Mal dich.{/n} "'Truchsess'? 'Lord Captain'? Habe ich etwa das Vergnügen, mit {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|einem Freihändler|einer Freihändlerin}{/g} zu sprechen? Gestattet mir, mich vorzustellen – Interrogator Heinrix van Calox von der ehrwürdigen Ordo Xenos der {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}imperialen{/g} Inquisition. Ich muss gestehen, ich bin überrascht, jemanden Eures Ranges an einem Ort wie diesem vorzufinden."
languages.original_text: {n}The man looks over at Abelard and then at you again.{/n} "'Seneschal'? 'Lord Captain'? Do I have the pleasure of speaking to a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}? Allow me to introduce myself — Interrogator Heinrix van Calox of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperial{/g} Inquisition's esteemed Ordo Xenos. I must confess I'm perplexed to meet someone of your standing in a place like this."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Mann mustert Abelard und dann ein weiteres Mal dich.{/n} "'Truchsess'? 'Lord Captain'? Habe ich etwa das Vergnügen, mit {mf|einem Freihändler|einer Freihändlerin} zu sprechen? Gestattet mir, mich vorzustellen – Interrogator Heinrix van Calox von der heiligen Ordo Xenos der {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}imperialen{/g} Inquisition. Ich muss gestehen, ich bin überrascht, jemanden Eures Ranges an einem Ort wie diesem vorzufinden."

{n}Der Mann mustert Abelard und dann ein weiteres Mal dich.{/n} "'Truchsess'? 'Lord Captain'? Habe ich etwa das Vergnügen, mit {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|einem Freihändler|einer Freihändlerin}{/g} zu sprechen? Gestattet mir, mich vorzustellen – Interrogator Heinrix van Calox von der ehrwürdigen Ordo Xenos der {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}imperialen{/g} Inquisition. Ich muss gestehen, ich bin überrascht, jemanden Eures Ranges an einem Ort wie diesem vorzufinden."

languages.text: {n}L'homme lance un regard à Abélard, puis revient sur vous.{/n} « Sénéchal ? {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine} ? Aurais-je le plaisir de me trouver en présence d'{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande}{/g} ? Permettez-moi donc de me présenter, interrogateur Heinrix van Calox, du vénérable Ordo Xénos de l'Inquisition {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Impériale{/g}. Je dois avouer ma perplexité à l'idée de rencontrer une personne de votre rang dans un tel endroit. »
languages.original_text: {n}The man looks over at Abelard and then at you again.{/n} "'Seneschal'? 'Lord Captain'? Do I have the pleasure of speaking to a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}? Allow me to introduce myself — Interrogator Heinrix van Calox of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperial{/g} Inquisition's esteemed Ordo Xenos. I must confess I'm perplexed to meet someone of your standing in a place like this."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'homme lance un regard à Abélard, puis revient sur vous.{/n} « Sénéchal ? {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine} ? Aurais-je le plaisir de me trouver en présence d'{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande}{/g} ? Permettez-moi donc de me présenter, interrogateur Heinrix van Calox, du vénérable Ordo Xénos de l'Inquisition {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Impériale{/g}. Je dois avouer ma perplexité à l'idée de rencontrer une personne de votre rang dans un tel endroit. »

languages.text: {n}El hombre mira a Abelard antes de devolverte la mirada.{/n} «¿"Senescal"? ¿"Lord Capitán"? ¿Tengo el placer de hablar con un{mf||a} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g}? Permita que me presente: Interrogador Heinrix van Calox del Ordo Xenos de la Inquisición {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperial{/g}. Debo confesar que me desconcierta encontrar a alguien de su categoría en un lugar como este».
languages.original_text: {n}The man looks over at Abelard and then at you again.{/n} "'Seneschal'? 'Lord Captain'? Do I have the pleasure of speaking to a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}? Allow me to introduce myself — Interrogator Heinrix van Calox of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperial{/g} Inquisition's esteemed Ordo Xenos. I must confess I'm perplexed to meet someone of your standing in a place like this."

traits.locale_text: {n}El hombre mira a Abelard antes de devolverte la mirada.{/n} «¿"Senescal"? ¿"Lord Capitán"? ¿Tengo el placer de hablar con un{mf||a} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g}? Permitid que me presente: interrogador Heinrix van Calox del Santo Ordo Xenos de la Inquisición {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperial{/g}. Debo confesar que me desconcierta encontrar a alguien de su categoría en un lugar como este».

languages.original_text: {n}The man looks over at Abelard and then at you again.{/n} "'Seneschal?' 'Lord Captain?' Do I have the pleasure of speaking to a Rogue Trader? Allow me to introduce myself — Interrogator Heinrix van Calox of the Imperial Inquisition's esteemed Ordo Xenos. I must confess I'm perplexed to meet someone of your standing in a place like this."

languages.text: {n}Adam, önce Abelard'a, sonra da tekrar sana bakıyor.{/n} "'Seneşal' mi? 'Lord Kaptan' mı? Bir {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g} ile konuşma şerefine mi nail oluyorum? Kendimi tanıtayım: Bendeniz, {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparatorluk{/g} Engizisyonu'ndan saygın Zeno Nizamı mensubu Sorgucu Heinrix van Calox. Böylesi bir yerde sizin mevkinizde biriyle tanıştığıma şaşırdım doğrusu."
languages.original_text: {n}The man looks over at Abelard and then at you again.{/n} "'Seneschal'? 'Lord Captain'? Do I have the pleasure of speaking to a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}? Allow me to introduce myself — Interrogator Heinrix van Calox of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperial{/g} Inquisition's esteemed Ordo Xenos. I must confess I'm perplexed to meet someone of your standing in a place like this."
